head.supplied: ¶ [The Park Ranger acknowledged the receipt of 23 packets of different kinds of seeds from Baron Von Mueller, for planting in the park. The Baron had asked that some marum grass seed might be sent hi...

div.p:
Letter not found. For the text given here, see the report of the meeting of the Port Fairy Borough Council held on 11 October 1893, in Belfast gazette, 13 October 1893, p. 2. The official minutes of the meeting (Minute book 10, p. 438, 11 October 1893, Borough Council records, Port Fairy) contain significantly less information.
[The Park Ranger acknowledged the receipt of 23 packets of different kinds of seeds from Baron Von Mueller, for planting in the park. The Baron had asked that some marum grass seed might be sent him, as well as a photograph of the grass.
According to the newspaper report, ‘The Mayor stated this request had been attended to, the photographer who was recently in the town having taken a number of the views'. ]
